snippet.title: High Stakes Design Notes
snippet.description:
In this longer video I go over some design notes on my new game High Stakes.

You can play High Stakes here
👉 https://krystman.itch.io/high-stakes
👉 https://www.lexaloffle.com/bbs/?tid=40099

Join our Discord
👉 https://discord.gg/N9NBX8R

Get T-Shirts Here
👉 https://shop.spreadshirt.net/lazydevs

Chapters:
0:00 Intro
4:10 Play Demo
12:52 How it went
14:02 Inspiration: I don't like Gambling
24:29 Inspiration: Gambling Anime
29:40 Inspiration: Netrunner
32:19 Inspiration: Other Games
35:02 Research: Solitaire
39:37 Research: Nintendo Clubhouse
44:01 First Prototype
51:24 Spoiler
54:07 Development
58:40 Technical Notes
1:13:35 Feedback
1:33:10 Upcoming Features
1:34:33 Wrapping Up!
